dialogues.Text: What have I done!? What are mom and dad going to think of me? I'm sure they'll be angry at me, but it's not like I can lie to them, that would disappoint them. I'm sure they'll understand I'm doing this for them.
One of my employees hasn't come back. I don't know what you've done with him, but I'll for sure make you pay if you've hurt him. Watch your step, you will not be safe in that �restaurant� of yours.
